name: ICU Room 109
description: You find yourself in a dimly-lit hospital ICU Room, eerily silent save for the occasional groan and shuffling of undead creatures lurking around every corner, as you cautiously make your way towards the west where you can hear the faint sounds of someone or something moving outside the ICU Room.

name: Hospital ICU Hallway
description: The hallway is silent, except for the sound of shuffling feet and moaning coming from the rooms. The walls are smeared with blood, and broken medical equipment litters the floor. On the wall you notice a large spray painted '4'.

name: Storage Closet
description: The cramped and cluttered storage closet is filled with broken and rusted medical equipment. The air is thick with the stench of rotting flesh, and you hear faint groans coming from the other side of the wall.

name: Hospital ICU Hallway
description: The hallway is silent, except for the sound of shuffling feet and moaning coming from the rooms. The walls are smeared with blood, and broken medical equipment litters the floor.

name: ICU Room 107
description: The room is dark, with a single flickering lamp. The bed is empty, but the window is shattered, letting in a cold breeze and the stench of death.

name: Hospital ICU Hallway
description: The hallway is silent, except for the sound of shuffling feet and moaning coming from the rooms. The walls are smeared with blood, and broken medical equipment litters the floor.

name: ICU Room 108
description: The room is dimly lit, with a patient lying on the bed, their eyes lifeless and their skin rotting. The machines beep rhythmically, but their sound is drowned out by the groans of the undead.

name: Hospital ICU Hallway
description: The hallway is silent, except for the sound of shuffling feet and moaning coming from the rooms. The walls are smeared with blood, and broken medical equipment litters the floor.

name: ICU Room 103
description: The room is a mess, with overturned furniture and blood smeared on the walls. The patient on the bed has turned into a zombie, and their movements are slow and jerky.

name: Hospital ICU Hallway
description: The hallway is silent, except for the sound of shuffling feet and moaning coming from the rooms. The walls are smeared with blood, and broken medical equipment litters the floor.

name: Hospital Atrium
description: The Hospital Atrium is a large, open space with a high ceiling and dim lighting. From here, you can see the entrances to all the other wings of the hospital, each with its own ominous atmosphere and sense of danger.

name: Hospital Quarantine Hallway
description: The hallway is covered in plastic sheets, creating a claustrophobic and ominous atmosphere. The only sound is the shuffling of zombie feet and the occasional groan.

name: Hospital Quarantine Hallway
description: The hallway is covered in plastic sheets, creating a claustrophobic and ominous atmosphere. The only sound is the shuffling of zombie feet and the occasional groan.

name: Quarantine Room 104
description: The room is dimly lit, with a single bed and a broken window. The undead patient on the bed is chained, but their moans suggest that they are about to break free.

name: Hospital Quarantine Hallway
description: The hallway is covered in plastic sheets, creating a claustrophobic and ominous atmosphere. The only sound is the shuffling of zombie feet and the occasional groan.

name: Quarantine Room 105
description: The room is empty, except for a single chair and a small table. The walls are stained with blood, and the air is thick with the smell of death.

name: Quarantine Room 106
description: The room is dark, with only a flickering lamp providing dim light. The patient on the bed has turned into a zombie, their movements slow and jerky

name: Hospital Quarantine Hallway
description: The hallway is covered in plastic sheets, creating a claustrophobic and ominous atmosphere. The only sound is the shuffling of zombie feet and the occasional groan.

name: Quarantine Room 108
description: The room is cold and sterile, with machines beeping rhythmically in the background. The undead patient on the bed is chained, but their growls suggest they are about to break free.

name: Hospital Quarantine Hallway
description: The hallway is covered in plastic sheets, creating a claustrophobic and ominous atmosphere. The only sound is the shuffling of zombie feet and the occasional groan. On the wall you notice a large spray painted '8'.

name: Hospital PSYCH Ward Hallway
description: The hallway is dimly lit and chaotic, with flickering lights overhead and the distant growls of the undead mixing with the loud and frenzied screams of patients from its past as a psych ward. The walls are covered in blood and deep scratches, and broken medical equipment litters the floor, creating a labyrinth of obstacles to navigate.
